thread.title: 51. Youth Revival Acoustic - Hillsong Young & Free

title: 51. Youth Revival Acoustic - Hillsong Young & Free

organizations.name: youth revival acoustic - hillsong young & free 21 items album review  youth revival

text:
21 Items Album Review 
Youth Revival is the second release by Hillsong Young & Free, the popular EDM-flavored worship group that first debuted from the Hillsong Church in 2013. Eschewing the more traditional praise pop of the church's other other musical branches, Young & Free spread their message through pulsing electro-pop and dance-oriented worship songs. As with their chart-topping debut, Youth Revival's 13 tracks were recorded live at Hillsong's home church in Sydney, Australia, and continue to build on the group's fresh, uplifting sound. [Youth Revival was also released as a CD/DVD set.] Customer Reviews by restlessandyoung It just keeps getting better! The real heart of these songs shines through simpler arrangements- this one's a gem. Love it! by _xbecksx_ Definitely a new sound for you and it's really good üëåüèΩ I look forward to hearing the whole album! Pretty good, but... by TheNorthJake So, I'm thinking you guys need to look up the meaning of "acoustic". A stripped down version of a song does not make it an acoustic version.... Biography Formed: 2012 in Sydney Australia Genre: Christian & Gospel Years Active: '10s One of the many groups affiliated with the Hillsong Church in Sydney, Australia, Hillsong Young & Free release worship music with a target audience of teens. Announced in 2012, the group issued the singles "Alive," "Awake," and the Spanish-language "Vivo Est√°s," all in 2013.
